TopicTitle: I won't play KSP for a few days...

Articles.Content:
...Because I wiil be getting a new PC, where i can waste more time of my life into KSP!

But, i can't play it because i had to unistall it to download it in the new PC, which will be arriving in a few days.

You can't imagine how horrible this is.

Yes I can. A couple months ago I got a new bunch of parts to put together so I could play KSP.

Turned out the mobo was bad, and I still don't have a replacement. :'(

...Because I wiil be getting a new PC, where i can waste more time of my life into KSP!

But, i can't play it because i had to unistall it to download it in the new PC, which will be arriving in a few days.

You can't imagine how horrible this is.

Why did you have to uninstall it to redownload it? Steam doesn't work that way, and I very much doubt Squad's system does either.

Why did you have to uninstall it to redownload it? Steam doesn't work that way, and I very much doubt Squad's system does either.

Unistall it in my current PC, redownload in my next PC.

And no, I won't transfer Steam games through an external drive.

Unistall it in my current PC, redownload in my next PC.

And no, I won't transfer Steam games through an external drive.

You know you can have it in both PCs...

You know you can have it in both PCs...

But i don't have that PC yet...

But i don't have that PC yet...

You don't need to install it in your current PC. You can keep it installed in the computer you still have, play it until your new computer arrives, and then install it in your new PC. And continue to play it in your old one if you wish.

You don't need to install it in your current PC. You can keep it installed in the computer you still have, play it until your new computer arrives, and then install it in your new PC. And continue to play it in your old one if you wish.

I won't keep this computer, i must give it clean, without any games, and then i will be without PC for 2 or 3 days until it arrives.

Sorry for any confusion.

I won't keep this computer, i must give it clean, without any games, and then i will be without PC for 2 or 3 days until it arrives.

Sorry for any confusion.

No problem, I see now.
